name: Draw Mixing
description:
Draw mixing is a cractive digital merge game.
Just connect the adjacent same numbers with wires!
Combine them into a larger number!
At first glance it seems easy, but then it will face challenges.
You can kill time or play with friends and family.

why choose this game
Beautifully easy and simple, no pressure and no time limit
Many interesting props
Easy to play. Interesting gameplay for all ages!

Note!!
Adjacent grids with the same number can be combined, no matter in which direction
You can never die in this game so try to get as high score as you can.
